document.full_text: monday's announcement suggested that no one would be held responsible for the mysterious pre-trial detention death of sergei l. magnitsky, who had been arrested after accusing police of tax fraud.
document.title: police investigator is cleared in death of russian awaiting trial
lines_and_colors: monday's announcement suggested that no one would be held responsible for the mysterious pre-trial detention death of sergei l. magnitsky, who had been arrested after accusing police of tax fraud.
